title: Add structured choice payload fields to get_action_choices
description:
Current get_action_choices heavily relies on free-form description strings for many decision types. This increases parsing ambiguity and makes robust downstream automation difficult.

Proposed direction:
1. Add stable machine-readable fields per choice (e.g. choice_id, object_id, zone, card_name, mana_cost, choice_type, is_mandatory).
2. Keep description as display-only text, not the primary machine contract.
3. Ensure all response_type variants (select/index/pile/amount/multi_amount) have consistent typed fields.
4. Document backward compatibility strategy so existing agents keep working while new fields roll out.

Design work needed:
- Define minimal required field set for each choice type.
- Decide which IDs are stable only for the pending action vs stable across game state snapshots.
- Add examples to MCP tool definitions and website docs.

Suggested source area: Mage.Client.Headless/src/main/java/mage/client/headless/BridgeCallbackHandler.java:getActionChoices and Mage.Client.Headless/src/main/java/mage/client/headless/McpServer.java tool schema.
